# shirthesis

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `shirthesis` is to provide functions that are used in Shir's PhD
thesis. A function is included here if it benefits three or more experiments (in
data cleaning, experiment code generation, etc.).

## Installation

You can install `shirthesis` from Github with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("shirdekel/shirthesis")
```
